title: Engravers MT - looking for a full font family with lower case that works like Engravers MT
content: My headline is in Engravers MT (not Gothic, St, Regular or Roman, etc.). I would greatly appreciate a suggestion for a full bodied, serif font that would allow me a full paragraph and several weights in sentence case that could substitute out this font. Engravers MT offers lovely, distinguished, old-fashioned serifs that create a vintage feel. I have found Narziss and Promotor, but I think one or two of these are free and have no varying weights, which is key.
author: pateeg

comments.content:
So you want a free alternative to Engravers MT?

hhp
It does not need to be free. Thanks.

Have a look at Ronaldson from Canada Type:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/canadatype/ronaldson/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150219143756/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/canadatype/ronaldson/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/canadatype/ronaldson/")

A Ronaldson search in myfonts generated several possibilities. Thank you so much!

(Clarendon is a bit too mid-century, need to stay in the late 1800s to early 1900s, but thank you very much.)
